DOC.brief_summary: The goal study evaluate effect multiple dos Desvenlafaxine Sustained Release ( SR ) pharmacokinetics Aripiprazole coadministered healthy adult subject . This study also evaluate safety tolerability Desvenlafaxine SR Aripiprazole coadministered healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Drug Interaction Study Evaluating Desvenlafaxine Succinate Sustained Release ( DVS SR ) 100mg On The Pharmacokinetics Of Aripiprazole When Coadministered To Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) Nonsmoker smoker few 5 cigarette per day determine history An informed consent document sign date subject History significant blood , kidney , endocrine , lung , gastrointestinal , heart , liver , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease History seizure disorder Presence history glaucoma increase intraocular pressure Allergy unable tolerate aripiprazole , desvenlafaxine , venlafaxine History substance abuse within 1 year study A positive urine drug screen Treatment investigational drug within 30 day Consumption grapefruit grapefruit relate citrus fruit 12 lead ECG demonstrate QTc > 450 msec screen Pregnant nursing female Use prescription nonprescription drug dietary supplement History sensitivity heparin heparin induce thrombocytopenia Severe acute chronic medical psychiatric condition laboratory abnormality
